import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Add = props => { const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const formData = props.formData const url = 'http://localhost:3500/api/v.1.0/students' axios.post(url, formData).then(response => {console.log('saved')}) props.addStudent(formData) props.history.push('/students') } return (
